column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////1. The worst moment...my husband ordered his steak (the $60 rib eye recommended by our server) "medium rare" (which is also what our server recommended).  The steak arrived well done.  Our server didn't check back right away
column2: but after frantically waving at other employees
column3: she came to our table. We showed her the black meat. She said
column4: "I'll have to check with the chef.  It could be rarer in the center."
